game.name: Warp Gate Galactic
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Validate credentials, provide travel, and catch baddies while maintaining your warp gate station on the dangerous fringe of the galaxy.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Validate credentials, provide travel, and catch baddies while maintaining your warp gate station on the dangerous fringe of the galaxy.
